00026  *\brief architecture independent timing functions

00029 
00030 #ifndef SYS_TIME_H
00031 #define SYS_TIME_H
00032 
00033 #include <inttypes.h>
00034 #include BOARD_CONFIG
00035 
00036 extern uint16_t cpu_time_sec;
00037 
00038 #define SYS_TICS_OF_USEC(us) SYS_TICS_OF_SEC((us) * 1e-6)
00039 #define SYS_TICS_OF_NSEC(ns) SYS_TICS_OF_SEC((ns) * 1e-9)
00040 #define SIGNED_SYS_TICS_OF_USEC(us) SIGNED_SYS_TICS_OF_SEC((us) * 1e-6)
00041 #define SIGNED_SYS_TICS_OF_NSEC(us) SIGNED_SYS_TICS_OF_SEC((us) * 1e-9)
00042 
00043 #define TIME_TICKS_PER_SEC SYS_TICS_OF_SEC( 1.)
00044 #define FIFTY_MS           SYS_TICS_OF_SEC( 50e-3 )
00045 #define AVR_PERIOD_MS      SYS_TICS_OF_SEC( 16.666e-3 )
00046 
00047 #include "sys_time_hw.h"
00048 
00049 
00050 #endif /* SYS_TIME_H */
